trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_SEQ_00<tab>Despite traveling halfway around the world, Alphinaud is in no mood to take in the sights.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hancock.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_TODO_01<tab>Follow Hancock.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_LYSE_000_001<tab>I...I don't know what I was expecting, but it wasn't this.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>It's very...colorful, is it not?
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_TATARU_000_010<tab>Strange... Is it just me, or is the ground swaying?

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_CARVALLAIN_000_015<tab>Myriad delights await you, should you elect to explore and experience─assuming you are sufficiently <var 1A 02 /var>open-minded<var 1A 01 /var>, that is. I, alas, cannot afford to linger...
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_KRAKENSDECKHAND_000_020<tab>Thanks again for, uh, saving us from certain death at the hands of Lorelei and whatnot. We'll not soon forget it.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALPHINAUD_000_025<tab>Glad though I am to have arrived, I would remind you all that we are far from home, with limited resources at our disposal...

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALISAIE_000_026<tab>Duly noted, Brother. I shall take care not to enjoy myself. In any event, Doma is our final destination, and our first order of business should be to secure passage there.

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALPHINAUD_000_027<tab>Captain Carvallain, I realize you pledged only to take us as far as Kugane, and I have no desire to change the terms of our agreement. I should, however, be interested to know how you would go about reaching Othard, were you in our position.

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_CARVALLAIN_000_028<tab>At the risk of stating the obvious...you are in a port. Surely there is a kind and generous soul here who will aid you for the right price? You cannot be the first travelers seeking passage to Doma.

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALPHINAUD_000_029<tab>...The captain makes a good point. 'Tis like that Yugiri and Gosetsu were forced to come here for the selfsame reasons we were. They must have found a way to Othard─assuming they are not still in the city.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>Hmm... Ere we seek passage, mayhap we should first seek our friends.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_TATARU_000_031<tab>Leave it to me, Alphinaud! Making friendly inquiries is my specialty. Lest you forget, I got plenty of practice in Ishgard!
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_TATARU_000_032<tab>Captain Carvallain, could you direct us to the nearest tavern?
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_CARVALLAIN_000_033<tab>Desperate for a drink, are we? You may find one in that large building just beyond the pier.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_CARVALLAIN_000_034<tab>Whether your journeys have come to an end or are about to begin, the Shiokaze Hostelry is an ideal place to rest, relax, and reflect. Or so they say.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_CARVALLAIN_000_035<tab>And with that, my dear Scions, I bid you farewell. As soon as we have replenished our supplies, we must away. Ours was ever a fast-moving business.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALISAIE_000_036<tab>The “spice trade,” you mean?
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_CARVALLAIN_000_037<tab>But of course. Surely you did not think I traveled halfway around the world and delivered you to your destination solely out of the kindness of my heart?
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALPHINAUD_000_038<tab>Perish the thought. Thank you, Captain, and may the Navigator watch over and keep you.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALPHINAUD_000_039<tab>Right, then. To the hostelry?
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_TATARU_000_040<tab>After you!
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_LYSE_000_045<tab>So there are imperial spies everywhere? Great. Just great...
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALISAIE_000_050<tab>(I daresay Alphinaud has met his match.)
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_TATARU_000_055<tab>(I don't trust him one bit...and neither should you!)
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>Forgive me. The mere mention of the East Aldenard Trading Company is enough to... <mumble> <mumble> I am fine. Truly. You need not worry.

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_070<tab>And you must be <var 29 EB02 /var>! Slayer of Gods... Rider of Dragons... Savior of Ishgard... Stealer of Pants─if some of the more puzzling rumors are to be believed.

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_071<tab>I knew it! May I say what an honor and a pleasure it is to make your acquaintance, <var 08 E905 ((my lady)) ((good sir)) /var>. I just know you and I are going to get along famously!
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_072<tab>Now then, without further ado, allow me to escort you to the company offices.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_073<tab>This being your first visit to our fair city, I shall make an effort to point out various landmarks along the way. If you would be so good as to follow me!
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_LYSE_000_080<tab>Even the aetherytes look different here...
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALISAIE_000_081<tab>I note that our would-be host has elected to dress in the local fashion.

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_TATARU_000_082<tab><sniff> <sniff> I say, what is that I smell wafting from yonder teahouse? Could it be─ Yes, could it just possibly be the scent of whispered secrets waiting to be overheard?
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_ALPHINAUD_000_083<tab>I do not like the cut of that man's jib. Not one bit.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_090<tab>Everyone! If I could have your attention, please. You are now standing in Tenkonto.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_091<tab>Loosely translated, the name means “spire of drifting souls,” which─as some of you may have deduced─makes reference to the aetheryte which stands over yonder.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_092<tab>Hmm... The design is markedly different from those of Sharlayan, yet I trust its function is identical?
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_093<tab>A diplomat and a scholar! Will wonders never cease.

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_094<tab>Far Eastern aetheryte technologies have a long and storied tradition, I assure you. This particular example was constructed by the Onishishu, a collective of skilled craftsmen, who guard their ancestral techniques with the utmost secrecy.
TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_HANCOCK_000_095<tab>In short, you will find it no less reliable than its western counterparts. Attune, if you like.

TEXT_STMBDA201_02470_EATCASSISTANT_000_100<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, and welcome to the Kugane branch offices of the East Aldenard Trading Company. Do you have an appointment?
